Package threading

Class CircularBuffer<T>

java.lang.Object
threading.CircularBuffer<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Generic type of data stored in CircularBuffer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Buffer<T>
public class CircularBuffer<T> extends Object implements Buffer<T>
CircularBuffer implements the Buffer interface to create a shared buffer for adding and retrieving data between active threads.
See Also:
Buffer

    T
    blockingGet()
    Gets the next value in the buffer, if no next value in buffer wait until a new value has been added from blockingPut.

  • Method Details

    • blockingPut

      public void blockingPut​(T value) throws InterruptedException
      Adds a value to the buffer, if buffer is full, wait until an opening has been created from blockingGet then add value.
      Specified by:
      blockingPut in interface Buffer<T>
      Parameters:
      value - Value to be added to buffer
      Throws:
      InterruptedException

    • blockingGet

      public T blockingGet() throws InterruptedException
      Gets the next value in the buffer, if no next value in buffer wait until a new value has been added from blockingPut.
      Specified by:
      blockingGet in interface Buffer<T>
      Returns:
      Next value at read index.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Returns whether the buffer is empty.
      Returns:
      True if there are no occupied cells in buffer.
